repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Western Regional Office Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR). Western Regional Office

did.abstract: Miscellaneous records from the ILR School's Western Regional Office in Buffalo, New York.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the publication, "Reflections on Progress at Work," and an announcement of ILR Extension courses in Buffalo, New York, offered in March and April 1952.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Western Regional Office Records #/4233m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Reflections on Progress at Work," 1996; announcement of ILR Extension courses in Buffalo, New York, March-April 1952.
